pages.text: My body is miraculously recovering , and now it is almost the same as before . In my spare time I developed a $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/polymerization_machine)machine for polymerizing$() . Finally , I did it , How smart I am.How beautiful this $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/refining_void_mixture)mixture$() is.

pages.title: Void Mixture
pages.text: This $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/refining_void_mixture)mixture$() is more powerful than before , When I hold it in my hand ,$(4) I can't help shaking$() . What can I do with it ? If I use it to make $(3)tools and armor$() . Is it possible to control this power . I need some time.
